DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of a local anaesthetic injection in the plane between the abdominal muscles in reducing the amount of pain relief required after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Transversus Abdominis Plane Block For Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of transversus abdominis plane block in reducing the morphine requirements after renal transplantation.
DOC.criteria: renal transplant recipients 18 to 75 years allergy to local anaesthetics chronic pain refusal
